Description: Pottery ostracon, a conjoining fragment with EA 47922. The text is a Ramesside jar etiquette.
Curator's comments: Info on conjoining fragment and identification of the text from Malte Roemer, 29-03-2016.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392552) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392552)
